resources.string: When the return gesture between some interfaces of the same Activity is not released, the interface that follows the hand shrinks.

Swipe right from the top bar or long press the back icon in the upper left to bring it up (some interfaces do not support this for the time being), which can quickly switch to the recently opened window and adjust some Settings. The sensitivity of sliding up and down after opening will decrease.
Study the gesture interaction operations within the application.
Display overdue courses on Focus page
Show or hide the courses completed today.
Display overdue schedules on Focus page
Show or hide the expired items in the self-added schedule.
Monthly free quota for the school net of Xuancheng Campus is %1$sGiB
Used for calculating and displaying usage percentages. (The initial value is %1$sGiB)
Customize the accounts added to the system calendar; By using email accounts, multi-device synchronization of class schedules and focus schedules can be achieved.
Automatically fill in the image verification code
When refreshing the login, use the OCR capability provided by the Tesseract library to fill in the verification code.
The user provides an ApiKey to send the data to the large model, offering more possibilities for the application.
Display courses that in Important-Matters of Focus page.
School card balance, electricity bill, bath, Internet fee, next class and other information.
One-click login and usage data of the school net.
Export or import the local database and preference Settings.
Clearing some cache won\'t affect the number of applications.
The course schedule of Community sometimes malfunctions and fails to update data. It is no longer recommended for use and does not support compensatory leave.
The course schedule of Uni-App will be automatically refreshed and the best recommendations will be made.

The course schedule of Academic is updated each time the login status is refreshed. After logging into the academic affairs office, if there is a course adjustment or withdrawal, it will change immediately. After the login expires, it will be cached locally.
Please turn off the switch when making modifications.

The overall semester mainly controls the academic affairs course schedule and other information. Other functions such as teaching evaluation can be freely switched between semesters in the corresponding functional areas. According to the local function calculation, the second semester is from February to July each year, and the first semester is from August to January.

Automatically refresh in response to the switch of semesters or changes in the course schedule; You can also customize the start time of this semester, which will affect the calculation of the number of weeks in the course schedule.
After modification, please switch to the Focus page, pull down to refresh to obtain the new course, and then return to the course schedule interface.
